title: Move a cloud category policy and verify E2E flow
custom_steps:
1. Use the REST APIs with tenant token to move a RTP with following criteria.
    1. Traffic Filter:
          a. Source Criteria:
          b. Destination Criteria: 
    2. Traffic Action:
          a. Profile:
          b. Action:
    3. Metadata:
2. Verify the Policy is moved to the new position in the tenant webui as per the Criteria.
3. Verify the RTP is downloaded in the backend dppool nodes 
4. Send traffic matching the Policy criteria
5. Verify Policy enforcement is succesfull on traffic matching the policy criteria.
